name: Roll Back Day
details: Live music and oyster specials all night!

name: Oysters Rock Live featuring 22N - The Ultimate Party Band
location: Anna Maria Oyster Bar Landside, 6906 14th St W, Bradenton, FL 34207
details:
Oysters Rock Live is back, and the Halfway Lawn is ready for you! 22N - The Ultimate Party Band is hitting the stage Friday, October 17, and it’s going to be one shell of a good time. Cold drinks, good food, and all the songs you can’t help but dance to!
Tickets are $10 for General Admission and $100 for VIP Table.

name: OneBlood Blood Drive
details: Come visit the OneBlood buses at the Anna Maria Oyster Bar and give blood!

name: Crustacean Dinner
details:
A five course coastal seafood experience with beverage pairings and an unforgettable night filled with live music, Amanda’s Wine Wall, raffles, and silent auctions.
Cost is $150 per ticket.
